text: Bachia whitei, White's bachia, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Tobago. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles of Trinidad and Tobago Category:Endemic fauna of Trinidad and Tobago Category:Reptiles described in 2019 Category:Taxa named by John C. Murphy Category:Taxa named by Daniele Salvi Category:Taxa named by Joana L. Santos Category:Taxa named by Alvin L. Braswell Category:Taxa named by Stevland P. Charles Category:Taxa named by Amaél Borzée Category:Taxa named by Michael J. Jowers
title: Bachia whitei
